sentences.english: Filled with the fruit of justice, through Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
sentences.chinese: 赖耶稣基督满结义德的果实，为光荣赞美天主。

sentences.english: A few nights later, one of these carefully selected friends was on sentry duty.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上，正好是他的一个结义兄弟站岗。
